title: Fluent Commerce Engineer
description:
**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Job Type:** 
 Contract
 



**Working hours** 
 : 12\\.30 \\- 8\\.30pm IST (Monday \\- Friday)
 



**Duration** 
 : 6 months (with likely extension)
 



  





 We are seeking a skilled
 **Fluent Commerce Engineer** 
 to join our omni\\-channel and order management engineering team. In this role, you’ll design, build, and optimize solutions on the
 **Fluent Order Management (Fluent OMS)** 
 platform to help us deliver exceptional customer experiences across digital and physical channels.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  




* Design, configure, and implement solutions using
 **Fluent Commerce OMS**
* Build and customize workflows, integrations, data models, and business rules
* Develop and maintain
 **Fluent Functions, Webhooks, Flows** 
 , and platform extensions
* Integrate Fluent OMS with third\\-party systems including e\\-commerce platforms, ERP, WMS, POS, payment systems, and logistics partners
* Collaborate with product, architecture, and engineering teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions
* Troubleshoot production issues, optimize performance, and ensure system reliability
* Implement best practices for order orchestration, inventory visibility, and fulfilment logic

* **JavaScript / TypeScript**
* **GraphQL \\& REST APIs**

 (Lambda, SQS, SNS, DynamoDB, etc.)

**Nice\\-to\\-Have**

**What We Offer** 




  




* Opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge omni\\-channel solutions
* A collaborative, innovative engineering culture
* Professional development
* Flexible working arrangements

title: ServiceNow Developer
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled
 **ServiceNow Developer** 
 with deep expertise in ITOM \\& ITSM to drive modernization efforts on the ServiceNow platform. This role is integral to designing, implementing, and optimizing advanced ServiceNow solutions that enhance IT operations, automate workflows, and improve service reliability.
   

  

 As a key member of the Cloud Information Services (CIS) team, you will work closely with architects, developers, and administrators to design and deploy scalable solutions while ensuring best practices in ServiceNow ITOM, ITSM, and other ServiceNow product areas. The ideal candidate is a strategic thinker with extensive hands\\-on experience in ServiceNow ITOM modules such as Discovery, Service Mapping, Event Management, and Cloud Management, along with a strong background in automation, integrations, and performance optimization.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the design, development, and implementation of ITOM solutions within ServiceNow, focusing on Discovery, Service Mapping, Event Management and CMDB to enhance IT operations and asset visibility.
* Design and optimize workflows, automation, and integrations that align ServiceNow capabilities with enterprise IT strategies, ensuring seamless connectivity with external systems and cloud environments.
* Provide expertise in ITSM module implementations, including Incident Management, Change Management, Service Catalog, and Service Portal, to improve IT service delivery.
* Collaborate with stakeholders across IT and business units to analyze requirements, define technical specifications, and deliver scalable, high\\-performance solutions.
* Drive best practices in ServiceNow development, including scripting (JavaScript, PowerShell), business rules, UI policies, and API integrations (REST, SOAP, LDAP, MID Servers).
* Ensure accuracy and integrity of the CMDB, driving best practices for data governance, reconciliation, and automation.
* Support DevOps and Agile development workflows, participating in backlog refinement, requirements decomposition, and iterative solution delivery.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex ServiceNow platform issues, ensuring high availability, security, and performance.
* Stay ahead of industry trends and ServiceNow advancements, identifying opportunities to enhance platform capabilities and drive innovation.
* Mentor junior developers and contribute to documentation of technical solutions, best practices, and operational guidelines.


**Required Qualifications**
* 5\\-10 years of hands\\-on ServiceNow development and administration experience, with deep expertise in ITOM and ITSM.
* Proven expertise in ITOM modules such as Discovery, Service Mapping, Event Management and CMDB best practices.
* Strong proficiency in ServiceNow development (scripting, workflows, business rules, integrations) and automation capabilities.
* Experience integrating ServiceNow with enterprise systems using REST/SOAP APIs, LDAP, and MID Servers.
* Proficiency in JavaScript, PowerShell, and HTML for advanced customizations and automation.
* Ability to assess, troubleshoot, and optimize system configurations for performance, scalability, and security.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex business needs into technical solutions.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to influence technical decisions and drive adoption.
* Commitment to IT security best practices, ensuring compliance with data confidentiality, integrity, and governance policies.
* Should be ready to work during EMEA Business hours (3 PM – 11 PM)


 This role is ideal for a
 **seasoned ServiceNow ITOM expert** 
 who is passionate about leveraging automation, optimizing IT operations, and delivering cutting\\-edge solutions on the ServiceNow platform. If you thrive in a collaborative environment and want to shape the future of IT service management, we invite you to join our team.

title: Cross Platform Developer
company: RGB Web Tech - Web Design, Web Development, Digital Marketing, PPC and App Development Company
description:
A Cross\\-Platform Developer is responsible for creating and maintaining software applications that can run on multiple operating systems and platforms, such as iOS, Android, Windows, and macOS. This role requires a deep understanding of mobile and desktop development frameworks, as well as proficiency in coding languages like JavaScript, React Native, Flutter, Xamarin, or other cross\\-platform development tools. The Cross\\-Platform Developer collaborates closely with a multidisciplinary team to design, develop, and deploy applications that provide a seamless user experience across various devices.
   

  

 Discover more
   

  

 testing

 Software

 software
   

  

 applications
   

  

 software development

 application
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop cross\\-platform mobile and desktop applications using frameworks like React Native, Flutter, Xamarin, or other relevant tools.
* Ensure the codebase is clean, well\\-documented, and easily maintainable. Perform regular code reviews and updates to address bugs and improve performance.
* Ensure that the applications are optimized for various platforms and devices, including smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers.
* Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement user\\-friendly interfaces and intuitive user experiences that meet the needs of the target audience.
* Integrate APIs, third\\-party libraries, and external services into the applications to enhance functionality and provide a seamless user experience.
* Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing, to identify and resolve issues, ensuring a stable and error\\-free application.
* Optimize the application's performance and responsiveness, addressing issues related to speed, responsiveness, and resource consumption.
* Implement security best practices to protect user data and application integrity, including data encryption, secure authentication, and vulnerability assessments.
* Utilize version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage and track code changes, collaborate with team members, and ensure code integrity.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of the codebase, project specifications, and development processes to facilitate knowledge sharing and future development.
* Keep up\\-to\\-date with the latest cross\\-platform development trends, tools, and technologies to ensure the application remains competitive and technologically advanced.
* Work closely with other developers, designers, product managers, and stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliver high\\-quality software solutions.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
* Proven experience in cross\\-platform development, with proficiency in relevant frameworks and languages.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot technical issues.
* Familiarity with mobile and desktop application design principles and UI/UX best practices.
* Knowledge of software development methodologies and best practices.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
* Detail\\-oriented with a strong commitment to quality.
* Adaptability and willingness to learn new technologies and tools.
* Familiarity with Agile or Scrum development methodologies is a plus.


**Additional Information**
* The Cross\\-Platform Developer role plays a crucial part in the development of applications that can reach a wide range of users across different platforms.
* Successful candidates should be passionate about creating high\\-quality, user\\-friendly software and stay updated with emerging technologies in the cross\\-platform development space.
* The position offers opportunities for growth and collaboration within a dynamic and innovative development team.


**Benefits**
* Benefit from invaluable mentorship provided by seasoned leaders.
* Enjoy a vibrant atmosphere enriched with engaging games and activities.
* Receive quarterly rewards as a token of recognition for your valuable contributions.
* Immerse yourself in a creative and open culture that fosters innovation.


**Job Type**
* Full\\-time / Freelance / Part\\-time / Contract


**Experience**
* A minimum duration of 6 months is mandatory.
* In case of no prior experience, you have the option to apply for an internship.


 Location:

title: SAP Integration Suite Engineer
description:
**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Job Type:** 
 Contract
 



**Working hours** 
 : 12\\.30 \\- 8\\.30pm IST (Monday \\- Friday)
 



**Duration** 
 : 6 months (with likely extension)
 



  





 We are looking for a
 **hands\\-on SAP Integration Suite Engineer** 
 to join our growing integration and digital transformation team. This role is ideal for someone who thrives on building modern cloud\\-based integrations, delivering clean and scalable workflows, and working closely with cross\\-functional business and IT teams.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





 Design, develop, and deploy integration flows using
 **SAP Integration Suite** 
 components such as:
 



  




* **Cloud Integration (CPI)**
* **API Management**
* **Event Mesh**
* **Open Connectors**
* Build, configure, and maintain
 **iFlows** 
 , adapters, mappings, and integration content
* Work directly with SAP and non\\-SAP systems to enable seamless end\\-to\\-end integration
* Develop and secure APIs, manage API gateways, and ensure integration governance
* Troubleshoot integration issues and optimize performance across cloud environments
* Collaborate with SAP functional, Basis, and business teams to ensure alignment of integration designs
* Document integration landscapes, technical designs, and operational procedures
* Follow best practices for monitoring, logging, error handling, and lifecycle management



  





**Required Skills \\& Qualifications** 




  




* Hands\\-on experience with
 **SAP Integration Suite** 
 , especially
 **Cloud Integration (CPI)**
* Strong understanding of
 **integration patterns** 
 , middleware, APIs, and cloud\\-based architectures
* Experience working with
 **SOAP/REST** 
 , XML, JSON, XSLT/Mapping, OAuth, and security standards
* Familiarity with SAP modules (e.g., S/4HANA, ECC, SuccessFactors, Ariba, Concur) and their integration frameworks
* Strong troubleshooting skills and experience with monitoring tools

* Solid understanding of Agile/DevOps processes and tools (Git, CI/CD pipelines, etc.)



  





**Nice\\-to\\-Have**

 , CAP, or Node.js/Java for extension development
* Experience integrating with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)

* Certification in
 **SAP Integration Suite** 
 or related SAP technologies



  





**What We Offer** 




  




* Opportunities for continuous learning
* A collaborative, modern engineering environment
* Flexibility and support for work–life balance
